entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 19 with temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
